title: Fishing Game Addition in Covey.Town
description: This project involved integrating an interactive Fishing Game Area into the pre-existing codebase, enhancing virtual exploration with engaging gameplay. In this feature, users are able to fish for rare catches, customize avatars, and compete for the highest score on a global leaderboard.
shortDescription: Integrated an interactive Fishing Game into Covey.Town â€” fish for rare catches, customize avatars, and compete on a global leaderboard.
techstack: Built using TypeScript, React, and Chakra UI, with real-time leaderboard updates via MongoDB. Sprites crafted with Photoshop, optimized using TexturePacker, and deployed via Netlify with automated testing.

title: Determining Bias in the Michelin Guide
description: Analyzed Michelin Guide biases in geographic and cuisine trends using machine learning. Results suggested a preference for established cuisines and high-end restaurants, potentially overlooking more diverse options for one-star ratings.
techstack: Built with Python using pandas, numpy, and scikit-learn. Visualizations were created with matplotlib and seaborn, and predictions were generated with K-NN, Random Forest, and SVM algorithms. Data was sourced from Kaggle.

title: Weekly Routine
description: A progressive web app for organizing weekly routines, tracking diet and macros, and logging workouts. Designed for mobile-first use with offline support and cloud sync.
techstack: Built with TypeScript and React using Vite, styled with Tailwind CSS, backed by Supabase for auth and data sync, and Zustand for client-side state management.
